components.layout.elements.MenuHeader.Me: 1.- Why is my email not found?
2.- Who can access the RFE application?
Users of Request for Evidence(RFE) must be invited by the auditor in order to access the engagement.
The auditor, who sends the request for evidence email, and the recipient of the request for evidence email can access the RFE application.

containers.UploadSupportDocument.index.R: 1. Select which transaction you would like to upload evidence against.  The selected transaction will be highlighted in grey.
2. Upload the documents into the Drag and Drop area related to your selected transaction.
3. No need to “Save” after each transfer, as invoices are uploaded immediately. If you’ve accidentally uploaded the wrong invoice, select the document icon to delete.
1. Select which transaction you would like to upload evidence against.  The selected transaction will be highlighted in grey.
2. Upload PDFs only into the Drag and Drop area related to your selected transaction.
3. No need to “Save” after each transfer, as invoices are uploaded immediately. If you’ve accidentally uploaded the wrong invoice, select the document icon to delete.
